name: Gil•INK
about: Gil•INK is the domain of Gil the Green. Gil is the leader of the Spellcircle (webring admin), a friend of fairies, and a babaylan

name: Rust Red River
about: Rust Red River is a website on the bank of a rainforest canal. It is the home of Dylan's writing, music, and space wizardry.

name: Kersed
about: Subterranean lair of the rogue magus known as Kern the Kersed - spell scribe, hidden hermit, keeper of crystals, a pebble in the river of knowing.
